component.name: Sublime Merge
component.summary: Sublime Merge is a Git client, from the makers of Sublime Text

description.p: Sublime Merge is a Git client, from the makers of Sublime Text.

ul.li: Search: Quickly write queries with auto-complete suggestions
Improved OpenGL rendering performance by automatically batching together controls
